title: EOG TV - Eye On Gardening TV
creator: Blue Wave Media

extendedInfo.description: Host Tim Alan showcases beautiful locations throughout the southeast and Caribbean including Costa Rica, Bahamas, and Jamaica as well as Hawaii. This app inspires and returns the audience to the therapeutic pleasure of gardening. You can watch episodes and clips of EOG for free and you can share them with your friends through Facebook and Twitter. Along with sharing tips on lawn care, affordable landscaping and general horticulture Eye on Gardening captures the unique features of the world's most beautiful gardens.
